akas: Állatok útmutatója a modernkori túléléshez Hungary
akas from release info: Állatok útmutatója a modernkori túléléshez Hungary

-1.title: Vacation Nightmares
-1.plot: Anchorage, Alaska: A woman gets too close to a polar bear cage to take a photo; Hauraki Gulf, New Zealand: A rescue helicopter is called for a couple and their dog after their boat starts sinking; Helena, Montana: Two brothers and their horses are trapped by a raging forest fire; Boston, Massachusetts: A shark pulls a fisherman off a boat and into the water; Whistler, Canada: Adog tumbles several hundred feet down a snow-covered mountain; Tanzania: Vacationers on a safari watch two giraffes pummeling each other.

1.title: Cobra Attack
1.plot: A Monocled Cobra, one of the world's deadliest snakes, shows an exotic animal trainer why it should be handled with care. Two men fishing unfortunately reel in a spinner shark. A black bear mistakenly climbs a power pole with disastrous results.

2.title: Polar Bear Attack
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Elephant Attack
3.plot: San Diego, California: A rampaging elephant attacks a trainer; Tzoonie Narrows, British Columbia: A Pacific octopus latches onto a diver's mask; Phillipsburg, New Jersey: A pet boa constrictor bites its owner on the face; Cochranville, Pennsylvania: A horse pulling a carriage kicks one of its riders; Marshall, Texas: A news reporter gets too close to a police dog; Boston, Massachusetts: A blue shark pulls a fisherman into the water; Detroit,Michigan: A man endangers himself when he jumps into a chimpanzee pen to save a chimp that had fallen into the water.

4.title: Nurse Shark Attack
4.plot: Calgary, Alberta: A bull tosses its rider 20 feet into the air; St. John's, Newfoundland: Rescuers attempt to save a polar bear stranded on a rocky cliff on a small island; Key Largo, Florida: A nurse shark bites a diver on the face; Kerala, India: An elephant goes on a rampage; Victoria, Australia: Five jockeys come off their horses when a flock of seagulls flies across the track; St. Marys, Kansas:Rescuers tend to a deer whose neck is wrapped in barbed wire.

5.title: Double Great White Attack
5.plot: Two Great White Sharks attack a surfer at once - and it is the only time this behavior has been captured on tape! A mule race in Brazil goes awry. A professional alligator wrestler undergoes an event that might make him rethink his career choice.

6.title: Lion Attacks Zookeeper
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Pregnant Tiger Rescue
7.plot: Hauraki Gulf, New Zealand: Rescuers attempt to save two people and their dog from a sinking boat; Rockwall, Texas: At a rodeo, a horse rears up and falls backward atop its rider; Wankie National Park, Zimbabwe: A baby elephant has been accidentally knocked on its back into a water trough; Rhodes, Michigan: A wildlife photographer is attacked by an eight-point buck; West Bengal, India: A pregnant tiger is trapped in a palm tree; Upper Peninsula, Michigan: An owl's wing is trapped in a fishing line.

8.title: Shorty the Bull's Revenge
8.plot: Boise, Idaho: A bull rider is thrown and repeatedly tossed around after being knocked out; Lake Catherine, Louisiana: A shark that is thought to be dead suddenly comes to life and snaps on a fisherman's hand when he sticks his hand in the mouth to point out parasitic fish in its throat; Helena, Montana: Two riders and their horses are trapped by a forest fire; Beacon, New York: A man is attacked by a rabid fox; Channel Islands, California: Rescuers rush to save two eaglets knocked out of their nest by a rogue male eagle; Loon Lake, Washington: Rescuers attempt to save...

9.title: Marlin Attack
9.plot: Piñas Bay, Panama: A young man is speared in the face by a black marlin; Isle of Skye, Scotland: A member of a rescue team trying to retrieve a cow stranded on the leg of a cliff falls into the surf; Alvin, Texas: A woman is attacked by a swarm of bees; Calgary, Alberta: A frightened dog that has fallen into freezing water bites the face of one of his rescuers; Denali Park, Alaska: A female bear defends her cubs against a hungry male bear; Dania Beach, Florida: A pelican is tangled in a fishing line in a tree 50 feet above the ground.

10.title: Cheetah Attack
10.plot: A TV host visits a cheetah enclosure and is attacked. An elephant goes berserk during a parade in India after being provoked by someone in the crowd. A skiing dog takes a head over tail tumble down a 200 foot mountainside and survives.

11.title: Goose Attack
11.plot: Pattaya, Thailand: A crocodile goes into a death roll after snapping its jaws shut on it's handler's hand; Casper, Wyoming: A bronco rider is kicked in the head after being thrown; Harrison, Arkansas: A man tries to rescue an owl with a hunter's trap clamped on its leg; Kaohsoiung, Taiwah: A 400-pound orangutan escapes its pen and goes on a rampage; Medeira, Portugal: A marlin pulls a fisherman out of a boat and dangerously close to the propeller; A rabbit narrowly escapes being run over by a cement truck; Virginia Beach, Virginia: A goose attacks a man and his dog in...

12.title: Bull Poker
12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Elephant Shock
13.plot: Santiago, Chile: An Elephant falls into a moat surrounding its enclosure, but then is later almost electrocuted by an electric wire that has been strung to keep the other elephants away from the rescue attempt; Wrangel Island, Russia: A polar bear cub is caught in a bear trap; Vancouver, British Columbia: A 12-year-old boy and a dog are stuck on a narrow ledge almost 1000 feet above the ocean below; Spokane, Washington: A 700-pound moose is lost in the city trying to find its way back out; Rayong, Thailand: At a water buffalo race, one of the buffaloes throws its ...

14.title: Amazing Attacks
14.plot: San Diego, California: A rampaging elephant attacks a trainer; Pattaya, Thailand: A crocodile goes into a death roll after snapping its jaws shut on it's handler's hand; Mexico City, Mexico: A rampaging bull named "Pajarito" jumps a wall and went right into the stands goring and hurting people; Wellington, New Zealand: Two lions Named Malik And Zulu attack a zookeeper when someone accidentally left the gate unlocked; Fort Myers, Florida: A monocled cobra bites a handler in the stomach and now it's a race to save the handler's life; East London, South Africa: A surfer ...

15.title: Terror in the Deep
15.plot: Piñas Bay, Panama: A 600-pound marlin spears an 18-year-old; Samill and the surrounding area; Similan Islands, Thailand: A diver loses a thumb feeding a moray eel; Dyer Island, South Africa: Divers have to exit their shark cage when a great white invades it; Antarctica: Tourists aboard a cruise ship watch a family of orcas hunt a seal trapped on an ice floe; Tzoonie Narrows, British Columbia: An octopus latches onto a diver's mask; Lake Catherine, Louisiana: A mako shark thought to be dead bites a man's hand.

16.title: Shark Takes a Leg
16.plot: Chilean Coast: A great white shark attacks a swimmer; Cheyenne, Wyoming: A horse at a rodeo kicks a rider in the head; Sandpoint, Idaho: A moose calf and its mother falls into icy waters in a frozen lake; Big Cypress Park, Florida: Cops unleash a police dog on a suspected robber; Los Angeles, California: A six-week-old kitten is trapped at the bottom of an eight-foot drain pipe.

17.title: Leopard Attack
17.plot: Lake Nakuru,Kenya: A ranger is attacked by a leopard after he tries to relocate it; Sydney, Australia: A cameraman covering a rodeo is smacked by a bull; North Canterbury, New Zealand: A dog is swept away when he falls into a river; Tempe, Arizona: A mountain hiker is attacked by a swarm of bees; South Korea: Two escaped elephants crash into a restaurant; New Brunswick, Canada: Three dolphins are stuck in mud when the tide recedes; Big Pine Key, Florida: Two young Key deer bucks box each other.

18.title: Beware of Charlie Bullware
18.plot: Anaheim, California: A bull rider is dragged by a bull after he is thrown, but his hand is caught in the rope; Milwaukee, Wisconsin: Four Clydesdales get loose from their team and plow into a crowd; Bangkok, Thailand: A cat falls and is impaled on a spiked fence; Centerbury, Ohio: A frog jumps onto the head of a snake while it is swallowing another frog, causing the snake to release it; New Hampshire: A dog tumbles end over end 200 feet down a skis slope; Melbourne, Australia: A kangaroo attacks Marty the Monster; Cannon Beach, Oregon: An elk is tuck in mud.

19.title: Wrong Way Horse Collision
19.plot: Prescott Downs, Arizona: A jockey suffers a traumatic brain injury when her horse collides with another horse that has started running the wrong way; Cxim, Brazil: A large anaconda clamps down on the hand of one of its handlers; La Paz, Mexico: A sperm whale is stranded in shallow water; Pueblo, Colorado: A black bear is in a tree behind a woman's house, and wildlife officers attempt to use a trampoline to break its fall after they tranquilize it;A stubborn muskrat that has claimed a Michigan ice fisherman's hole bites him when he tries to move it; Melbourne, ...

20.title: Lions, Camera, Action!
20.plot: Berlin, Germany: A lion attacks his trainer; Belton, Texas: A bull flips a bullfighter into the air multiple times; Santa Fe, New Mexico: A dog is stuck at the bottom of a 180-foot well; Shelbyville, Indiana: A harness racer is catapulted after her horse stumbles; Cayman Islands: A stingray bites at a diver's groin; Long Beach, California: A kitten is trapped on a narrow wall near the Los Angeles River; Gatorland, Florida: A crocodile grabs another's leg and starts turning.

21.title: Gaucho, Ouch-O!
21.plot: Jacksonville, Florida: A man and his son are trapped in a car that is stuck in a hole, and being attacked by yellow jackets; Mt. Maroon, Australia: Two men and their dog are trapped on a narrow ledge an a sheer cliff; General Picco, Argentina: A gaucho is pounded against the ground when he is thrown from a horse, but his foot is caught in a stirrup; Inola, Oklahoma: A small child is bitten on the hand by a pet albino python; Santiago, Mexico: A bull butts a drunken spectator; Slickville, Pennsylvania: A deer is caught in muck around a pond.

22.title: Elephant Seal Attack
22.plot: Sea of Cortez, Mexico: An elephant seal bites down on a diver's head; Dothan, Alabama: A bull smacks a female rider in the face; Porter, Texas: A man climbs a 70-foot tree to retrieve his pet cockatoo, then is unable to get down; Adelaide Hills, Australia: A jockey is dragged behind his horse when his foot gets caught in a stirrup when comes is thrown; Bronson, Michigan: A police cruiser hits a deer; Bangkok: An elephant is stuck in four feet of mud.

23.title: Trouble at the Track
23.plot: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania: A female jockey is thrown, kicked in the head, and trampled; Anderson, Indiana: When a harness racer is dumped, the horse starts to run into the crowd; Melbourne, Australia: A horse in a steeplechase tosses it rider high into the air when it goes over the last jump; Sydney, Australia: A 70-year-old harness racer falls is run over by four sulkies after he falls out of his own after suffering a heart attack; Berkley, California: A horse manages to finish in second place while the jockey hangs onto its neck after the horse stumbles, throwing ...

24.title: Pilot Whale Attack
24.plot: Queensland, Australia: A crocodile clamps down on a rangers hand and goes into a death roll; Kona, Hawaii: A pilot whale grabs a diver's leg and drags her down 30 feet before releasing her; Los Angeles, California: A horse has fallen onto her back in a trench with her rider trapped underneath; Namibia, Africa: A zebra fights off a lion and gets away; A black bear breaks into a parked car; Watsonville, California: Rescuers save a puppy caught in a flood

25.title: Gator Tricks Gone Bad
25.plot: "Untamed and Uncut" brings you the most incredible animal encounters ever caught on tape! From heart-stopping attacks, to heartwarming real stories about the world's most amazing creatures.

26.title: The Moaning Cowboy
26.plot: Nashville, Tennessee: A bull rider ends up underneath a bull after he gets knocked out when the bull hits hits him in the head with a horn; Forbes, Australia: At a horse race, the lead horse stumbles, causing a pile-up; Port Elizabeth, South Africa: At a wildlife park, an elephant calf is unable to get out of a watering hole that it has slipped into; Phoenix, Arizona: A police dog tackles a man claiming to have a bomb; A zebra bites a crocodile's eye after the crocodile grabs a front leg; Playa Del Rey, California: A sea lion is trapped in a power plant's water basin;...

27.title: Catapulted Horse Racer
27.plot: A chariot racer is catapulted 40 feet in the air in Idaho. A massive earthquake rocks China, and the race is on to save a group of pandas that have been left stranded. A dog crashes the Tour de France.

28.title: Tiger Attacks Zookeeper
28.plot: Calatagan, Philippines: Four tigers attack a zoo-keeper when he turns his back on them at feeding time; Puerto Angel, Mexico: A bull throws its rider, then later starts tearing up the makeshift stands; Point Barrow, Alaska: Rescuers attempt to save three gray whales stranded five miles from open water in an ice hole; Albuquerque, New Mexico: A bear 50 feet up in a tree in a residential neighborhood misses the air mattress when it falls out of the tree after being shot with a tranquilizer dart; A wild turkey chases an Ohio State patrolman into his patrol car; Melbourne...

1.title: Teeth, Talons, Terror
1.plot: Guadalupe Island, Mexico: Tow divers in a shark cage are joined by a great white; Dallas, Texas: A bull rider is tossed off his bull; Sylmar, California: Rescuers attempt to save a horse who has become stuck in mud; Los Angeles, California: A bird handler at the Los Angeles Zoo is attacked by a hawk; Indianapolis, Indiana: A dog is stranded on ice.

2.title: Heroes and Horror
2.plot: Tabatinga, Colombia: A reporter is bitten by an anaconda; Los Alamitos, California: A jockey is seriously injured after she comes off her horse; Ames, Iowa: Rescuers attempt to save an injured bald eagle being attacked by crows; Selma, Alabama: A dog comes to the aid of an officer being attacked by a suspect; Los Lunas, New Mexico: A bear is trapped in a sewage tank.

3.title: Mother Nature's Nightmares
3.plot: Pamplona, Spain: A man is knocked down and tossed around by a bull; Hot Springs, Arkansas: An alligator clamps down on a handler's arm; Burgaw, North Carolina: A flood caused by Hurrican Floyd leaves four cows and a horse stranded on a home owner's porch; Pinnaroo, Australia: A plague of mice invade a farm; St. Simons Island, Georgia: A woman and her dog have to be rescued after landing in a marsh.

4.title: Sudden Peril
4.plot: Rejkjavik, Iceland: 12 horses fall into freezing water when the frozen lake cracks; Paterna, Spain: A person participating in the running of the bulls is repeatedly tossed around; Cody, Wyoming: A family outing turns into a rescue mission for an elk stuck in a deep hole in a creek; Moreno Valley, California: A 14-foot python clamps onto its feeder's hand; Long Reef, Australia: Kayak Fisherman are attacked by a great white shark.

5.title: Claws, Clashes, Chaos
5.plot: Sondelani, Zimbabwe: A supposedly tame leopard attacks a wildlife photographer; Baltimore, Maryland: A bull fighter takes a hoof to the chest, sending him flying backwards; Gold Coast, Australia: Rescuers attempt to save a humpback whale that has a shark net wrapped around its tail; Recife, Brazil: A young girl is attacked by a monkey; Marion, Indiana: A dog gets stuck after chasing a rabbit into a culvert.

6.title: Whale Watch
6.plot: Silver Banks, Dominican Republic:A humpback whale smacks an underwater cameraman with its tail; Point Barrow, Alaska: A gray whale and her calf are trapped in a blanked of ice five miles away from open water; La Paz, Mexico: A 50-ton sperm whale is trapped in shallow water; Kona, Hawaii: A diver is pulled 30 feet down by a pilot whale; Gold Coast, Australia: A young humpback whale's tale is caught in a shark net that it is dragging behind it.

7.title: The Wedding Crashers
7.plot: Murwilumbah, Australia: An Aussie cowboy-themed wedding goes bad when the horses leading the carriage rear up; Oklahoma City, Oklahoma: A bull in a rodeo knocks over a mounted bull tender; Hingham, Massachusetts: Rescuers attempt to save a dog after it falls through ice after chasing a seal; Greensburg, Pennsylvania: Deer overrun a convenience store; Manchester, England: A jet pilot has to make an emergency landing after a bird strike; Punta Gorda, Florida: Animal control officers have to extract a boa constrictor that has climbed into a car's engine compartment.

8.title: Beastly Headaches
8.plot: Silver Banks, Dominican Republic: A humpback whale smacks an underwater cameraman with its tail; Tacoma, Washington: A horse knocks out its rider when it rears up and their heads collide; Glen Canyon National Recreation Area, Utah: A bighorn sheep is trapped in a pit; Boys Ranch, Texas: A 14-year-old steer rider is flipped off and stomped; Taipei, Taiwan: A goat is trapped on the side of a cliff; Satuli, India: An elephant cow and her calf are trapped in an irrigation pond with steep banks.

9.title: Beware the Bite
9.plot: Marshall Islands, North Pacific Ocean: A gray reef shark bites a fisherman's foot when it is hauled on deck; Calcasieu Parish, Louisiana: Flood waters from Hurricane Ike threaten a nervous Rottweiler that has already bitten one rescuer; Glendale, Arizona: A bull rider is knocked out stomped; Little Rock, California: A two-year-old Clydesdale has become trapped in a whole left from an old septic tank; Vancouver, British Columbia: An orca touches noses with a dog on a boat; Salt Lake City, Utah: A red-tailed boa bites its owner's hand.

10.title: Un-Bear-Able
10.plot: Albuquerque, New Mexico: A black bear running through town looking for her lost cub is almost electrocuted when she climbs a utility pole; Chengdu, China: An earthquake rocks a panda reserve; Wrangel Island, Russia: A polar bear cub is caught in a fox trap; Pueblo, Colorado: A black bear has climbed a tree in a residential neighborhood; Denali National Park, Alaska: A grizzly bear defends her cub against a hungry roving male grizzly; Los Lunas, New Mexico: A bear has fallen into a sludge tank.

11.title: Rodeo Rampage
11.plot: Calgary, Alberta, Canada: At the Calgary Stampede, a bull tosses its rider 20 feet into the air; Las Cruces, New Mexico: A bull batters a 'bull poker' player; Cheyenne, Wyoming: A wild horse kicks its rider in the head; Sydney, Australia: A bull at a rodeo heads for the videographer; Boise, Idaho: A bull repeatedly butts its rider after having tossed him to the ground; Rockwall, Texas: A horse rears up and falls backwards onto its rider.

12.title: Cat-tastrophes
12.plot: Kenya: A park ranger is attacked by a leopard being released into the wild; Calatag, Phillipines: Four tigers attack a zoo-keeper when he turns his back on them; Maasi Mara, Kenya: Tourists videotape a buffalo heard coming to the rescue of a young buffalo being attacked by several lions; , then being rescued by its heard when it calls out; Berlin, Germany: A lion attacks its trainer; Los Angeles, California: Rescuers attempt to save a kitten that has fallen into an eight-foot drain pipe.

13.title: Unlikely Heroes
13.plot: Jersey, Channel Islands: A young boy falls into a gorilla enclosure at a zoo; Costa of Durban, South Africa: A tiger shark bites a diver's thigh; Clifton, Colorado: A dog's owner tries to save his dog who has fallen into icy water; Reno, Nevada: A bullfighter lands on his neck after being tossed by a bull; A baboon escapes from a crocodile's jaws; Medway, Ohio: A man who had had one leg surgically reattached after being in a car accident tries to rescue a raccoon whose head is stuck in a peanut butter jar.

14.title: Railed, Jailed, and Nailed
14.plot: Del Mar, California: After his horse stumbles, a jockey ends up underneath the horse; Bali: A macaque bites a young boy; Shelby, North Carolina: A Dutch Shepherd helps subdue an escaped convict; Paso Robles, California: A bull steps on his rider's head after throwing him; Australia: A king brown snake is trapped in an aluminum can; Nasiriyah, Iraq: Soldiers attempt to rescue a baby camel trapped in a 12-foot well.

15.title: Cheating Death
15.plot: Calgary, Alberta: A chuck wagon driver is thrown off his cart and dragged underneath; Coria, Spain: During the Running of the Bulls, an animal rights activist is repeatedly tossed around by a bull; Reno, Nevada: A woman attempts to rescue her dog from a frozen lake; Samburu National Reserve, Kenya: Rescuers attempt to aid an eight-month-old baby elephant with an injured leg; A cuttlefish launches a sneak attack on an octopus; Bressler, Pennsylvania: Deer hunters try to save a deer stuck in mud.

16.title: Costly Mistakes
16.plot: Silver Banks, Dominican Republic: A humpback whale smacks two divers with its tail when they get too close to her calf; Virginia City, Nevada: A camel racer is thrown from her mount; Walnut Creek, California: A tree falling into a creek pins a horse against the bank; Tobarra, Spain: A bull catches up to a bull jumper; St. Paris, Ohio: A dog is stuck in a drainpipe.

17.title: The Struggle for Survival
17.plot: Seville, Spain: A bull knocks out a matador when he smacks him in the face; Boca Raton, Florida: A man struggles to save his two dogs from his van that has fallen into a sinkhole full of water; Mojones Sur, Argentina: A horse rears up and falls back onto its rider; A squirrel leaps just in time from a building that is being razed; Cairns, Australia: A cat is rescued from a utility pole, then leaps out of the truck that rescues it.

18.title: Big Cats, Crashes, and Carnage
18.plot: Taipei, Taiwan: An unstable man climbs into a lion's den; Springfield, Illinois: A buggy rider is pitched out of his cart after his horse starts bucking; Queensland, Australia: A wallaby is trapped in a rip current; Southwestern England: A biplane knocks over a cow as it glides in for a landing after the engine fails; A koala bear has climbed a utility pole and is in danger of being electrocuted; Ciudad Valles, Mexico: A bull rider is tossed around and stomped: Hagaman, New York: A dog gets its head trapped in a metal watering can.

19.title: Mayhem and Miracles
19.plot: New Orleans, Louisiana: A bull rider is tossed headfirst against the bars of the chute; New York City: US Airways Flight 1549; Mendoza Argentina: A TV host is chased in a zoo by an agitated elephant; Greeley, Colorado: Two horses spook pulling a covered wagon; Tangalooma, Australia: Rescuers attempt to save a dolphin bitten by a shark.

20.title: Under My Skin
20.plot: Niglintgak Island, Canada: An Arctic researcher is infested with seven bot fly larvae; Almenara, Spain: During the Running of the Bulls, a runner is repeatedly tossed around; Graham Island, British Columbia: Rescuers attempt to save a beached baby humpback whale; Oklahoma City, Oklahoma: A barrel racer's horse rears up and falls back onto her; Kenya: A baby elephant is trapped in a six-foot well.

21.title: Angels and Demons
21.plot: Canary Islands: A diver is bitten by an angel shark; Pretoria, South Africa: A python latches onto a man's hand; Maypadi, India: A frightened leopard is trapped at the bottom of a well; New York City: A bull rider is whacked on the back of the head and kicked by a bull; Melbourne, Kentucky: A horse slips into icy water; Tokushima, Japan: A dog is trapped on the ledge of a retaining wall.

22.title: Berlin Polar Bear Attack
22.plot: Berlin, Germany: An emotionally disturbed woman jumps into a polar bear pit; Tallebudgera, Australia: A diver attempting to aid a humpback whale entangled in a shark net gets smacked by one of its fins; Sunburst, Montana: Two white-tailed bucks' antlers become entangled; Saltillo, Mexico: A horse kicks a bronco rider in the face; India: A toddler plays with a defanged cobra; Kruger National Park, South Africa: A baby elephant's front leg becomes wedged in a fork in a downed tree.

25.title: Shark Games
25.plot: Four divers play tag with sharks with deadly consequences; a bullrider's family members are in the path of danger; a polo horse falls on its rider.

imdb.title: Untamed & Uncut
plot: A collection of incredible animal incedents::alawarabood
